title: Annie is 100x worse than syndra
body: damage of a syndra ult except it ccs in an aoe and it chases you down and fucks u harder after the cast too. Killed annie? now it fucks you hard again

replies.body: if only you could CC the bear.....wait...
by your logic 50 syndras would lose to 1 annie right?
i suppose so if all 50 were grouped up and annie hit 6 first (since all the Syndra's would be sharing exp)

Even with 50 Syndras, they should at least hit level 2 before she hits 6, right? They should be able to keep her permastunned at that point. Heck, they could knock her back consistently until she was out of xp range...

I wish I could have 50 Syndras for my midlaner.

Literally ALL of Syndra's basic spells are AOE. 
Her ultimate is also a point-and-click of doom with a MINIMUM of 540 Magic damage at max rank.
Tibbers only deals minimum 400 damage.
If she has a enough damage and/or orbs she doesn't even need her ultimate to engage.
Annie needs both Flash and Ultimate for an effective engage. 

Annie is very short ranged for a mage, and is punished easily (At least in Higher elos). 
Tibbers enraging after you kill Annie is not as bad as people put it out to be. 
I don't think I've ever died to Tibbers that way.

I agree that Annie is strong and reliable (and the bane of all Yasuo players) but you can't tell me a level 6 Annie which Tibbers deals 150 damage on impact is the same as a Syndra who hits you with a 6 sphere ultimate for 540 damage....

Not to mention the best Syndras can get a 7 sphere ultimate off
